import React from 'react' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import { withRouter } from 'react-router-dom' import { createStructuredSelector } from 'reselect' import { selectCartItems } from '../../redux/cart/cart.selectors' import CustomButton from '../custom-button/custom-button.component' import CartItem from '../cart-item/cart-item.component' import { toggleCartHidden } from '../../redux/cart/cart.actions' import './cart-dropdown.styles.scss' const CartDropdown = ({cartItems, history, dispa}) => (
{ cartItems.length ? ( cartItems.map(cartItem => ( ))) : ( Your cart is empty ) }
history.push('/checkout') }>GO TO CHECKOUT
) const mapStateToProps = createStructuredSelector({ cartItems: selectCartItems }) export default withRouter(connect(mapStateToProps)(CartDropdown))
